actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 238 - 177 (Record Vote No: 3).

official_title: A resolution referring the election of a Member from the Eighth Congressional District of Indiana to the Committee on House Administration, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Refers the election of a Member from the Eighth Congressional District of Indiana to the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: A resolution referring the election of a Member from the Eighth Congressional District of Indiana to the Committee on House Administration, and for other purposes.
